articles.author: Garry Doyle
articles.title: Live: Leicester v Ulster, European Challenge Cup semi-final - The42
articles.description: Ulster take on Leicester Tigers in tonight’s Challenge Cup semi-final as Dan McFarland’s team seek to move to a first European final in nine years.
articles.content: 7:37PMFor once, Leinster aren’t here to block Ulster’s path. There’s no Toulouse, either; no Saracens – none of the sides who have made life so unpleasant for them in recent European seasons. What is… [+822 chars]

articles.title: Unai Emery faces second major Villarreal blow ahead of Arsenal Europa League decider - Football.London
articles.description: Unai Emery returns to the Emirates Stadium for the first time since his Arsenal sacking in November 2019, but is facing a team selection problem for the Europe League decider
articles.content:
Arsenal are still in with a chance of reaching the Europa League final.

articles.title: Apple’s App Store Draws E.U. Antitrust Charge - The New York Times

articles.description: (Reuters) -     Executives from five of the six English clubs involved in the controversial breakaway European Super League have resigned from their posts on various Premier League committees, Sky Sports reported on Thursday.
